(boolean, false) DEMO_CATEGORY, --demoCategory : The category of data posted as demo data. (alphanumeric) ENDPOINT_HTTP_AUTH_PASSWORD, --endpointHttpAuthPassword : The password to connect to the embedded HTTP endpoint. If defined, it must be sent as Basic auth together with its username.
